snippet.title: Saturn Longplay [073] Sega Ages: Space Harrier
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: MadMatty

Pretty much an arcade accurate port to the Sega Saturn of Space Harrier released in 1996 as part of the Sega Ages collection. If it is not clear by now I am quite the fan of these Sega Super Scaler games.

Not much to say on this one. Its just a single run through the game which runs at a smooth 60fps. No extra modes were unlocked at the end. Some secret options not shown here include being able to change the shadow strength (Saturn mode) to make shadows a little darker (from what I can tell) which might help with targeting. No arranged music in this version. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
